rows.label: bf03310100_0020
rows.name:
Th-that Core Crystal color...
It can't be... Eeeeek!

rows.label: bf03310100_0030
rows.name:
This is bad. He's gone
to call his companions.

rows.label: bf03310100_0040
rows.name:
Even a regular soldier knows about it. Rumors
about Homura must have spread quite far.

rows.label: bf03310100_0050
rows.name: I'm sorry. I should have worn the robe.

rows.label: bf03310100_0070
rows.name:
From what I've heard, it's
some wealthy Nopon merchant.

rows.label: bf03310100_0110
rows.name:
You've grown so much!
How's old man Cole doing?

rows.label: bf03310100_0120
rows.name: I see... Not doing well, huh?

rows.label: bf03310100_0140
rows.name:
Hm? Ah, this is Ion. She's the
child of an acquaintance of mine.

rows.label: bf03310100_0160
rows.name:
Let's move. It'll be trouble
if the soldiers come back.
